name: Pia Pandora vs The Tickle Trio
name_original: Pia Pandora vs The Tickle Trio
description:
You play as Pia's faithful companion Shadow and your mission is to protect her from the menacing Tickle Trio!

Best Windows screen resolution for a smooth running game is 1280 x 720

Music: The Origin of Fire - Hildegard von Bingen by Anonymous 4
